app_descript:
Brief: Sleep Booster is a unique sleep aid app designed to help users achieve a restful night's sleep and wake up feeling refreshed. By leveraging techniques such as deep calm breathing, soothing sounds, meditation sessions, and a smart alarm, Sleep Booster aims to improve sleep quality and overall well-being.
